product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GENERAL CIVIL > RCC PIPE CULVERTS & ELECTRICAL ROAD CROSSINGS ETC.
product_entries.full_product_description: Transportation of all kind of valves( including special and motor operated valves) from owner's storage point to contractor's store/ work site and installation of valves for all rating including assembly of valve accessories, if any, fixing of gaskets, bolts/ nuts etc. complete as per specifications drawings and direction of Engineer-in-charge including returning all unused/ surplus material to owner's storage point (valves along with accessories shall be supplied by owner as free issue material) Flanged/ Wafer Valves Nominal Dia.   8 Inch (Sl. No. 689, ITEM NO 01GC.30.1.1.1V2)
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: valve type: flanged or wafer, includes: transportation from owner's storage to contractor's store/work site, installation for all rating, assembly of valve accessories, fixing of gaskets, bolts/nuts, as per specifications, drawings and direction of engineer-in-charge, return of unused/surplus material, valves and accessories supplied by owner as free issue material

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GENERAL CIVIL > RCC PIPE CULVERTS & ELECTRICAL ROAD CROSSINGS ETC.
GENERAL CIVIL > RCC PIPE CULVERTS & ELECTRICAL ROAD CROSSINGS ETC.
product_entries.full_product_description: Removal of existing U/G piping (Sl. No. 691, ITEM NO 01GC.32.2)

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GENERAL CIVIL > RCC PIPE CULVERTS & ELECTRICAL ROAD CROSSINGS ETC.
product_entries.full_product_description: Removal of existing U/G piping including excavation in all types of soils except soft rock and hard rock, including supply of any additional material required so as to expose the pipes for removal / dismantling, taking all safety precautions, supporting existing U/G services, dewatering of surface / sub-surface water as required to facilitate dismantling of pipes, cutting of pipes in appropriate lengths for transporting purpose, removal of soft material from bottom of trench and compacting, backfilling with available selected earth including re-excavating the deposited soil excavated earlier, breaking clods, laying in thickness not exceeding 15cms, watering rolling and ramming by manual methods / mechanical Compactors to achieve 90% laboratory maximum dry density as per IS:2720 Part VII or 85% relative density as per IS:2720 part XIV as applicable, stacking of serviceable / unserviceable material, transporting and stacking of all piping material to Owner's storage point, disposal of unserviceable material anywhere outside the complex etc. , all complete as per directions of Engineer-in-Charge.(Disposal areas shall be arranged by the  contractor at his own cost. The rate quoted shall include all royalties, right-of-way etc. complete.) (Sl. No. 692, ITEM NO 01GC.32.2.1)
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: includes: excavation in all types of soils except soft rock and hard rock, supply of additional material to expose pipes, safety precautions, supporting existing underground services, dewatering, cutting pipes for transport, removal of soft material from trench, compacting, backfilling with selected earth, re-excavating deposited soil, breaking clods, laying in thickness â‰¤15cms, watering, rolling, ramming by manual/mechanical compactors to achieve 90% laboratory maximum dry density as per IS:2720 Part VII or 85% relative density as per IS:2720 part XIV, stacking of serviceable/unserviceable material, transporting and stacking piping material to owner's storage, disposal of unserviceable material outside complex, all complete as per engineer-in-charge, disposal areas by contractor, rate includes all royalties, right-of-way

original_rows.3: Removal of existing U/G piping including excavation in all types of soils except soft rock and hard rock, including supply of any additional material required so as to expose the pipes for removal / dismantling, taking all safety precautions, supporting existing U/G services, dewatering of surface / sub-surface water as required to facilitate dismantling of pipes, cutting of pipes in appropriate lengths for transporting purpose, removal of soft material from bottom of trench and compacting, backfilling with available selected earth including re-excavating the deposited soil excavated earlier, breaking clods, laying in thickness not exceeding 15cms, watering rolling and ramming by manual methods / mechanical Compactors to achieve 90% laboratory maximum dry density as per IS:2720 Part VII or 85% relative density as per IS:2720 part XIV as applicable, stacking of serviceable / unserviceable material, transporting and stacking of all piping material to Owner's storage point, disposal of unserviceable material anywhere outside the complex etc. , all complete as per directions of Engineer-in-Charge.(Disposal areas shall be arranged by the  contractor at his own cost. The rate quoted shall include all royalties, right-of-way etc. complete.)
